participant_1.background:
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
I am a single, language genius who enjoys shopping and collecting memories from my travels.
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i hate running.

participant_2.background:
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i always seem to be losing things , most recently , my mind.
My family is very supportive of my child with autism, and we are all working together to help him live a happy and fulfilling life.
I started a food truck to share my love of cooking with the world.
i know how to drive a truck.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to cook and I started a food truck to share my love of cooking with the world.
That's awesome! I like to cook too, but I don't have a lot of experience.
What kind of food do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
I love Italian food too! Have you ever tried making pasta from scratch?
No, I haven't tried that yet. I'm not very good at cooking, but I'm always up for trying new things.
You should give it a try! It's not as hard as you might think.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
What else do you like to do in your free time?
I also enjoy spending time with my family. I have a child with autism, and we are all working together to help him live a happy and fulfilling life.
That's great that you're so supportive of your child. I'm sure he's lucky to have you.
Thank you. He's a great kid, and I love spending time with him.
What do you like to do with him?
We like to go to the park, play games, and read books together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure he loves spending time with you too.
